snippet: Stepan was listed as day to day after sustaining what the team called an upper-body injury Tuesday night against the Islanders.
abstract: New York Rangers center Derek Stepan is day-to-day after an upper-body injury; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stepan was listed as day to day after sustaining what the team called an upper-body injury Tuesday night against the Islanders.

headline.main: Rangers’ Derek Stepan Is Day to Day
headline.print_headline: Rangers’ Stepan Is Day to Day
